abstract: The Walt Disney Company on Thursday confirmed its purchase of the television broadcast rights to two events for the coming inauguration of President-elect Barack Obama.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company on Thursday confirmed its purchase of the television broadcast rights to two events for the coming inauguration of President-elect Barack Obama.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company on Thursday confirmed its purchase of the television broadcast rights to two events for the coming inauguration of President-elect Barack Obama.

headline.main: ABC and Disney Channel to Televise Inauguration Events
